InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: CoolCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The name CoolCore says it all. Designed by Juno Starwerk to be as hardworking as you are, this cooler helps ensure that your entire ship operates well within desired temperature parameters.

InstalledItem.Name: Diligence
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Though the Diligence delivers high performance compared to other components in its class, this power plant’s dependability and ease of maintenance is what makes it a favorite of haulers.

InstalledItem.Name: Bolon
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Don’t let lesser craftsmanship put you and your precious cargo at risk. The Bolon industrial quantum drive was built with durability in mind to keep it working when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

Basilisk’s Aspis industrial shield generator features durable design and reliable performance, earning it a place on Whitley’s Guide ‘Best Buy’ list.

InstalledItem.Name: Nav-E7 Echo Scanner
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Nav-E7
Size: 4

The Echo scanner from Nav-E7 utilizes enhanced long-range sensor capabilities and the manual precision of a remote turret mount to become an indispensable tool during search operations.
